name: pyload-clicknload
description: ClickNLoad functionality for PyLoad or just to copy ClickNLoad links manually

scripts.package: rm -f release-macos64.zip && rm -f release-win64.zip && pkg app.js --targets win,macos --out-path ./release && cd release && zip release-macos64.zip app-macos && zip release-win64.zip app-win.exe

author: Laberbear
